about.title: Nexdor Solutions
about.description: Nexdor is a trusted bridge between traditional retailers and brands, distributors, and wholesalers. We are committed to providing comprehensive distribution solutions, driving the robust growth of traditional businesses within the modern retail ecosystem.

items.content: Sạp Lê La was a completely new brand, so we faced numerous challenges in the early stages of building our image and operating on e-commerce platforms. Nexdor helped us optimize everything from A to Z: setting up the store, creating content, devising reasonable pricing and promotion strategies, and running effective ads.

Previously, Đậu Má Mix had stores on food delivery platforms but they weren’t optimized, and performance was low. Partnering with Nexdor Solutions helped our stores improve everything from visuals and content to pricing strategies, making operations smoother.

From a small takeout rice stall, Cơm tấm Ba Lộc now has nearly 10 hubs and is about to open a dine-in restaurant. Thanks to Nexdor, our brand was professionally built from the logo and Uncle Ba Lộc character to a polished fanpage, helping Ba Lộc reach customers more effectively.

Gà Nướng Ò Ó O is a brand with a widespread store network, but optimizing our online stores still had limitations. Thanks to Nexdor, we significantly improved our visuals, content, pricing, and promotion strategies on food delivery platforms.

When Lucky Pao started online business, we struggled to attract customers and operate our store efficiently. Nexdor optimized every aspect—from brand building and image enhancement to running well-structured marketing campaigns.

aboutUs.title: Our Story
aboutUs.description: Nexdor Solutions takes pride in our experienced team and deep market understanding, delivering creative, personalized strategies to help clients optimize business performance and build strong brands. At Nexdor Solutions, we are not just partners but trusted companions, committed to helping you achieve every goal and create lasting value. Let us help you tell your brand story in an impressive and successful way!

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.description: We offer deep, comprehensive insights into the Vietnamese market, equipping you with the knowledge to make informed strategic decisions and unlock success. With our expertise, you can confidently navigate the market and seize growth opportunities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Nexdor equips you with a cutting-edge D2C technology platform, enabling you to seamlessly build and manage your direct-to-consumer sales channels.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Xanh Marketing will be your trusted partner throughout every stage of your marketing journey, from strategic planning to flawless campaign execution, ensuring your brand stands out and resonates deeply with Vietnamese consumers.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: With an expansive distribution network and strategic partnerships across 53 provinces, Vigo ensures your products reach every corner of the Vietnamese market from bustling cities to the most remote rural areas.
